name: 張世豪
objective: 本課程接續計算機組織，介紹現今行動平台處理器之之組成原理與設計概念，並且結合 VHDL 硬體描述語言與 FPGA 實驗平台，修課同學可以學習如何使用 FPGA 平台自行設計處理器，並可應用於現代主流手機與手持裝置處理器架構分析與開發，與開發人工智慧 AI 相關處理器應用。
schedule:
Introduction to CAD Tools – VHDL Language (2 weeks)
Combinational Logic Systems using VHDL (3 weeks)
Synchronous Sequential Circuits and Finite State Machines using VHDL (3 weeks)
Advanced Topics in VHDL Design (3 weeks)
Design the Components of a Processor using VHDL (2 weeks)
Design the Processor's Datapath and Control on FPGA system (3 weeks)
scorePolicy:
Lab Practices & Reports & Course Participation: 60%
Finishing lab practice in the course time will get bonus scores.
Midterm on-line exam: 20%
Final Project: 20%
materials:
David A. Patterson and John L. Hennessy, “Computer Organization and Design: The Hardware / Software Interface”, 5th Ed., Morgan Kaufmann, 2013.
ISBN: 9780123744937, 東華書局代理.
Lab. Materials
自編實驗講義教材
Major references
